item.description:
(860) 872-1977

519 Talcottville Rd, Vernon Rockville, CT

I know its been a while since I have posted some thing Sorry Guys. I'm back. Rsvp yes or no and If you have suggestions let me know!!!!!!!!


Super local Chinese Restaurant: The food and value are great. The often have coupons for a few bucks off. But beyond that, the portions are great, and they offer optional brown rice, which is a lot healthier. The takeout service, which I usual get, is great. The sitdown service is polite and efficient. Their menu is quite varied, and the food tasty.
item.how_to_find_us: I will make a reservation under SANDY

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND
